channel.title: Legit Dicing
channel.description: Any one here do legit dicing? i need someone i can trust because i just lost 25m.

item.title: Legit Dicing
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:63, topic:408017”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=509301.msg3696574#msg3696574 date=1312474071]
hehe made 20m in 5 minutes in casey’s clan, its crazy how much you can make… though i made retarded bets n lost it.
[/quote]
haha it’s not my clan

Just remember, never go all in and bet smart.[/quote]
Yeah, well actually i meant the clan you use, but meh.

And yeah, i was doing idiot betting, now im doing smart betting, and now ive earned…
22m now. (Going on from the post 2 above)
@elve heres what i do:
I start off with a small amount, either 1m, or 500k (If the host accepts 500, i give him/her that)
I win, sweet, i stay at 1m/500k. I loose, i go to 2m/1m, then 4m/2m, if it doesnt work at that, i quit at it for a while, then come back at the initial value, it works nicely :D.

But becoming a hoster is the best…

I mean, i see like 60-70 10m+ bets a day from one hoster… (If they stay long) they get 1m off each, an easy 70m a day, no risks. And i saw a 2b wage (1b each player), boom, 200m easy, it may be hard to find a high roller, but it would pay off
EDIT
23m now.
24m.
Just lost a 1m, 2m, then 4m, down to 17m profit, going back to 1m/500k.
back to 18m
After a rough couple mins, im up to 19m

Read full topic

[/quote]

What do you mean bet smart? Ofc don’t go all in, and don’t loose 3/4 more of what you’ve made.

item.title: Legit Dicing
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:45, topic:408017”][quote author=ExtremeX-Scape™ link=topic=509301.msg3696337#msg3696337 date=1312460295]
No not really^

I know my luck isn’t the best :
I didn’t win one match yesterday.
[/quote]Actually if you remember, I gave you 1m to dice with to start with D: So even if you lost, It was my money I won back.

Also if I recall right you won 600k, And the OP was won over 1m from me then diced and lost most of it, Then kept dicing.

He was winning, Winning, Lose, win, lose, lose lose ,lose, win. IT was funny actually xD[/quote]That made me mad >.<

Read full topic

item.title: Legit Dicing
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:47, topic:408017”][quote author=ExtremeX-Scape™ link=topic=509301.msg3696347#msg3696347 date=1312460770]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=509301.msg3696344#msg3696344 date=1312460657]

No not really^

I know my luck isn’t the best :
I didn’t win one match yesterday.
[/quote]Actually if you remember, I gave you 1m to dice with to start with D: So even if you lost, It was my money I won back.

Also if I recall right you won 600k, And the OP was won over 1m from me then diced and lost most of it, Then kept dicing.

He was winning, Winning, Lose, win, lose, lose lose ,lose, win. IT was funny actually xD

I never won I lost the 1m you gave me you got it back& I sold all my junk and shit got 800k and lost it all, I have 46gp left

[/quote]Lol well you shouldn’t bet all your cash XD[/quote]

Well I’m a dumbass for doing so, time to gold farm -.-

Read full topic
